title: Saturn Transit in the 12th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting your twelfth house initiates a phase of withdrawal, closure, and deep inner restructuring. External progress may slow as focus shifts toward solitude, healing, and unfinished karmic matters. Expenses related to health, isolation, or responsibilities can increase, demanding disciplined management. This transit encourages detachment from old burdens and unconscious fears. Through patience and inner discipline, Saturn prepares you for a new cycle by strengthening spiritual resilience and emotional self-reliance.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: You seek meaning beyond external validation.

sections.heading: Career
points: Progress is subtle but strategically important.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Need for personal space becomes stronger.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses require strict control and planning.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Old fears rise for conscious release.

closing: Saturn here closes a cycle. What you release in silence becomes the ground for a stronger new beginning.
